channel.title: Entropy
channel.description:
[SIZE=4]This a one of a few npcs ive been working on for a while and wanted to get feed back on it. Tell me what you think.[/SIZE]

item.title: Entropy
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“poopler40, post:11, topic:542128”][quote author=N_A link=topic=661002.msg4418930#msg4418930 date=1397445845]
The Bison Rolovir model looks very cool. Good work! Why is it the thread titled Entropy though?

edit: oh, is the girl’s name Bison Rolovir?
[/quote]

Entropy is the name of the first npc. I was going to make individual threads for each npc but changed my mind.[/quote]Oh I see, I assumed the first NPC was Bison Rolovir due to the horns on its head (not really bison horns, but oh well.) Regardless, cool models!

Read full topic

item.title: Entropy
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

[quote=“N_A, post:10, topic:542128”]The Bison Rolovir model looks very cool. Good work! Why is it the thread titled Entropy though?

edit: oh, is the girl’s name Bison Rolovir?[/quote]

Entropy is the name of the first npc. I was going to make individual threads for each npc but changed my mind.

item.title: Entropy
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:6, topic:542128”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=661002.msg4418857#msg4418857 date=1397416990]
The animation for the first NPC seems a bit fast after the first swing, but they both look really cool.
[/quote]I agree, the first animation needs to be slowed down a tad. Second one is really well done.

Are you using Mr.Potatohead’s animator?[/quote]

they are jagex animations

Read full topic
